        string(ASCII 27 Esc)
        set(ColourReset "${Esc}[m")

        add_subdirectory(md5)

        set(ColourReset "${Esc}[m")

        message(STATUS "${Red}Cannot find OPENSSL library. Using slower build in MD5 algorithm.${ColourReset}")
        add_subdirectory(md5)
endif()
